Tyrone Appollis bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe na onye na-ede uri.
Ọ gụrụ nka na Community Arts Project n'okpuru Cecil Skotnes n'etiti afọ 1982 na 1987
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịmepụta Mitchells Plain Art Group na 1988
O meela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka nke obodo na nke mba ụwa
N'afọ 2008 wepụtara mpịakọta mbụ ya nke uri.
1994: Nnukwu mgbidi maka Mahadum nke Western Cape
1997: Obodo ahụ nyere ya iwu ka o mee nnwere onwe nke ihe osise nke Bishọp Tutu.

1999: O ji otu afọ wee na-akụzi ma na-akpali ụmụaka na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma egwu na eserese na Cape Flats.
Akpụkpọ akwụkwọ maka onye a ma ama na-ede uri bụ James Matthews.
2000: E wuru ihe ncheta maka ndị Trojan Horseʹ iji cheta ọnwụ ụmụaka nwụrụ n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ.
